def Load(widget): item = widget.Entity if item == None: return
emElaboracao = item.OrdemVendaInstance.EmElaboracao
if widget.View.Commands["New"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = emElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = emElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = emElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["SaveNew"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["SaveNew"].Visible = emElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["CMD_COMISSOES"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_COMISSOES"].Visible = emElaboracao and item.VisibilidadeComandoComissoes if widget.View.Commands["CMD_GERARENTREGAS"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_GERARENTREGAS"].Visible = emElaboracao
